name: Race To Defend The Alien Slime From The Evil People In Cars
name_original: Race To Defend The Alien Slime From The Evil People In Cars
description:
A giant alien slime has come to this world to help. But they are misunderstood, and people are trying to force it to leave. Help the slime by spreading smaller slimes to get rid of the people as they race to chase away the slime. 

Controls:

Accelerate: W

Turn: A D

Make Slime: Space

Instructions:

Finish 15 waves to win.

You are the red car.

Cost of new Slime Tower is displayed on the bottom left.

You can need to keep slimes stocked with ammo so they can shoot.

Collect ammo from the giant slime by running over it then give the ammo to the smaller slimes by running over them. 

You lose health (Top Right) when a car hits you or the giant slime.
